**課程簡介**

本課程提供零起點的德語初學者學習基礎的德語會話、語法和詞彙。從學習發音和相關的基礎詞彙開始，學生可以逐步學到基礎的語法知識。在課程結束時，學生應具有基本的會話能力，可以自我介紹、認識朋友以及詢問一些資訊。

**英文簡介**

The course aims to teach German grammar and conversation to the students without any prior knowledge of this language. Starting with learning pronunciation and basic vocabulary, students will acquire the basic grammar step by step. At the end of this course, students should be able to carry out simple daily conversations, for example, introducing oneself, getting to know each other, and ask for some information.
